Learning_Objectives: Understand Azure security services, basic security concepts, compliance frameworks

Training_Content: KQL syntax, Advanced queries, Performance optimization, Security use cases

Learning_Objectives: Develop custom detection rules, understand MITRE ATT&CK, optimize rule performance

Learning_Objectives: Create automated response playbooks, integrate with security tools, manage workflows
Training_Content: Logic Apps fundamentals, Security automation patterns, Integration techniques

Learning_Objectives: Conduct proactive threat hunting, analyze adversary techniques, develop hunting hypotheses
Training_Content: Threat hunting methodology, Advanced KQL, Behavioral analysis, Attribution

Learning_Objectives: Manage security incidents, conduct forensic analysis, coordinate response activities
Training_Content: Incident lifecycle, Evidence collection, Forensic techniques, Communication

Learning_Objectives: Understand security compliance frameworks, implement audit controls, generate reports

Learning_Objectives: Lead security operations teams, manage performance metrics, develop security programs
Training_Content: Team management, Metrics and KPIs, Budget planning, Strategic planning

Learning_Objectives: Collect and analyze threat intelligence, create IoCs, support threat hunting

Learning_Objectives: Conduct digital forensics, analyze malware samples, preserve evidence integrity

Learning_Objectives: Secure Azure environments, implement security controls, monitor cloud resources

Learning_Objectives: Understand security threats, implement security best practices, recognize social engineering

Learning_Objectives: Conduct penetration tests, simulate attacks, identify vulnerabilities

Learning_Objectives: Secure industrial systems, understand OT threats, implement OT monitoring
